entry.title: Week in Ethereum News June 11, 2022
entry.summary: Eth News and Links PoW switch off (the Merge) Ropsten testnet merge a major success: ~99% participation & proposal rates after config fixes & reboots some client pairs proposing empty blocks Latest core devs call video. Notes from Tim Beiko: Testnets: Sepolia merge in 3 weeks, Goerli merge in 6 weeks Difficulty bomb to be

entry.title: Week in Ethereum News June 4, 2022
entry.summary: Eth News and Links PoW switch off (the Merge) Ropsten testnet is ready to turn off PoW forever with TTD set Tool to predict TTD arrival Stakers/nodes must manually override TTD in latest client release Manual override is useful practice in case of miner hijinx on mainnet Guides on running Ropsten nodes or specifically a

entry.title: Week in Ethereum News May 28, 2022
entry.summary: Eth News and Links PoW switch off (the Merge) Mainnet-shadow-fork-6 transition to PoS on May 31 Ropsten testnet reached Terminal Total Difficulty (TTD) before Ropsten beacon chain genesis: miner added hash rate & lowered gas limit in malicious stress test TTD being overridden to very large value to prevent merge override TTD after Ropsten beacon

entry.title: Week in Ethereum News May 21, 2022
entry.summary: Eth News and Links PoW switch off (the Merge) Client bug bounties now $250k, doubles to $500k for merge upgrades live on public testnets & targeted for mainnet Mainnet-shadow-fork-5 went exceedingly well, equal split of execution & consensus layer clients Ropsten beacon chain genesis May 30, with merge targeted around June 8 Help test the

entry.title: Week in Ethereum News May 14, 2022
entry.summary: Eth News and Links PoW switch off (the Merge) Ropsten testnet upgrade to PoS estimated for June 8 (Terminal Total Difficulty 43531756765713534) Mainnet-shadow-fork-4 merge looked perfect, Erigon had unrelated sync issues Mainnet-shadow-fork-5 merge on May 19, equal validator split across execution & consensus layer clients Staking safely post-Merge requires client diversity for both consensus &
